document.full_text: amazon.com inc said on thursday that it now sells more digital e-books than paper books and that its recently introduced lower-priced kindle e-reader is outselling other versions of the device.
document.title: amazon says e-books now outselling paper books
lines_and_colors: amazon.com inc said on thursday that it now sells more digital e-books than paper books and that its recently introduced lower-priced kindle e-reader is outselling other versions of the device.
